I think that this game can consume your entire life. You can have 2 roles. The good ones had to plant a bomb in some weird places while shoot AK-47. In some maps they have plastic bags in their face for better protection. On the other hand, you have the bad cops. They're ni.ggas with rare equipment and should stop the good ones. I hate those f.cking anti-terrorists.

In conclusion, play the game under your own consequences. Don't forget to say goodbye to your family and friends, because you'll spent the rest of your life in this Valve's game flaming in russian (bad english)

I have learned several eastern european languages through this game.
Better than Duolingo, also 'cause there's no owl holding your family at gunpoint.

9/11, would play again
